duration.description: Time for the tween. Total time from begining to end equals to delay + duration

relative.description: If the tween is relative to the actual value of the tween target. Default is false

repeat.description: How many times the tween repeats. -1 for forever. Default is 0

repeatDelay.description: Time before the tween starts a repetition. This delay applied after duration if repeat is set to something different to 0.

yoyo.description: If the tween must come back to its initial state

easeEquation.description: Ease equation. Defines how the value for the tween is interpolated. More info about easing functions: http://easings.net/. Default is linear
